Place Aurora.js files here to enable optional decoding helpers.

Minimum:
- aurora.min.js (core)
Optional codecs (put alongside if needed):
- flac.min.js, alac.min.js, aac.min.js, mp3.min.js, etc.

Reference:
- https://github.com/audiocogs/aurora.js (and codec repos)

App expects:
- ./vendor/aurora/aurora.min.js

Aurora is currently optional; ffmpeg remains the primary decoder.
